players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana was found dead, any info?"
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso, Alice figured it out. Stay cautious."
You: "I'm the detective. Charlie confirmed as mafioso. Stay vigilant."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia, stay alert. Vote Charlie."
You: "Charlie confirmed mafia, watch him closely. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Will prove my innocence. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
